sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CCol, CButton, CRow } from '@coreui/react' import MaterialTable from 'material-table'; import {Menu,MenuList,MenuButton,MenuItem,} from "@reach/menu-button"; import "@reach/menu-button/styles.css"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const getBadge = status => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'success' case 'Inactive': return 'secondary' case 'Pending': return 'warning' case 'Banned': return 'danger' default: return 'primary' } } const fields = ['name','registered', 'role', 'status'] const Tables = () => { return ( <> Household Vulnerability Assessment Add New Household Assessment Action ▾ First View Second View Third View {" "}Edit {" "}Delete }, { name: 'Zerya Betül', surname: 'Baran', birthYear: 2017, birthCity: 34, action: Action ▾ {" "}View {" "}Second View {" "}Third View {" "}Edit {" "}Delete }, ]} options={{ search: true }} /> ) } export default Tables
